column5: I'll be watching it in High def 8:00 sharp.Anyone else gonna check it out? Joe
Normally I don't watch hockey ... but Team Canada is really looking good into the 2nd period.    Seem to have really good puck movement and control.    GO TEAM CANADA

I give the Norwegians credit. They played really solid hockey the first period for a bunch of non-nhl'ers. Now in the second Canada is starting to wear them down, but they are definitely better than I would have expected.

I missed the first stanza cause of the womens curling so they picked up the game with 2 mins left in the first.Its 5-0 now and I'm switching back and forth between the game and the dog show.Go Canada!exept when you play us. Joe
what a smart, simple game played by Team Canada. They did evertything from "the book". Good for them. Hat trick Iginla!!!!!
I think the Norwegians did well..  It wasn't for lack of spirit... WOOT WOOT!!
